title: A speech made in Parliament by Sir Simon Dvcy knight on Twesday the eleventh of Ianuary concerning proceeding against the 12 bishops accused of high treason to bring them to their triall 1642.
author: D'Ewes, Simonds, Sir, 1602-1650.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles and T. Banks,
notes: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
